price: ហើយតើពួកគេមិនបានពិចារណាចំពោះសត្វអូដ្ឋទេឬថា វាត្រូវបានគេបង្កើតយ៉ាងដូចមេ្ដច?
arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: afalā yanẓurūna ilā al-ibili kayfa khuliqat
